Description: Fragment of black figure (?) pottery amphora; echinus shaped ring foot and lower part of body. Outside covered in slip fired red; surface worn; red stripe at lower edge on outside of foot. Red dipinto in shape of anchor underneath the base; outline incised (in part incorrectly) by Petrie. Hard, fine, orange/reddish clay, Munsell 2.5YR 6/6.
Curator's comments: Incised outline of dipinto marked by Petrie as 'INCIS 86'
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxxii, right, bottom)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 356)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.127, p.129, p.226, pl.68)
